scripts.start: VERSION=`sentry-cli releases propose-version`;echo export const version ={git:\"$VERSION\"}>src/version.js;npx prettier -w src/version.js;HTTPS=true PORT=3006 react-scripts start
scripts.build: export SENTRY_ORG=the-meeting-house;VERSION=`sentry-cli releases propose-version`;sentry-cli releases new -p the-meeting-house $VERSION;sentry-cli releases set-commits --auto $VERSION;echo export const version ={git:\"$VERSION\"}>src/version.js;npx prettier -w src/version.js;react-scripts build;sentry-cli releases finalize $VERSION;sentry-cli releases deploys $VERSION new -e prod;
scripts.publish: COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD`;amplify publish -c;curl --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --request POST --data '{"content":"Published a new version from commit: '$COMMIT'"}' $DISCORD_WEBHOOK_WEB
scripts.amplify:themeetinghousea5cd4619: cd amplify/backend/function/themeetinghousea5cd4619/src && rm -rf node_modules/sharp && SHARP_IGNORE_GLOBAL_LIBVIPS=1 npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux sharp
scripts.backup: export z=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S); mkdir backup/$z; cd backup/$z; dynamodump export-all-data --region=us-east-1 --profile amplify
scripts.syncProd: for z in $(find ./public/static -name "*.json"); do npx jsonlint $z -q; if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then echo $z; exit;fi; done; aws s3 sync ./public/static s3://heeetingouse-20190312104205-hostingbucket-tmhprod/static ;  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EYO80SQB3QGL --paths '/static/*' --profile amplify
scripts.syncBeta: for z in $(find ./public/static -name "*.json"); do npx jsonlint $z -q; if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then echo $z; exit;fi; done; aws s3 sync ./public/static s3://heeetingouse-20190312104205-hostingbucket-dev/static ; aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E57FJUWPGBGGI --paths '/static/*' --profile amplify
scripts.syncProdDry: for z in $(find ./public/static -name "*.json"); do npx jsonlint $z -q; if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then echo $z; exit;fi; done; aws s3 sync ./public/static s3://heeetingouse-20190312104205-hostingbucket-tmhprod/static --dryrun ;  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EYO80SQB3QGL --paths '/static/*' --profile amplify
scripts.syncBetaDry: for z in $(find ./public/static -name "*.json"); do npx jsonlint $z -q; if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then echo $z;exit; fi; done; aws s3 sync ./public/static s3://heeetingouse-20190312104205-hostingbucket-dev/static --dryrun; aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E57FJUWPGBGGI --paths '/static/*' --profile amplify
scripts.syncTest: for z in $(find ./public/static -name "*.json"); do npx jsonlint $z -q; if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then echo $z; exit;fi; done;
